::Hot Rod::

He looks up at Iron Raptor.
"This bot here wishes to join our ranks." Windlords message came in.
"And also, Windlord needs to know if Maximals will help the Chivitons."

::Epyon::

"Ok, Alpha. I'll see you soon."

::DrillBit::

He reaches the BlackFortress, and transformes.
